p: Two-month treatment with Z. multiflora extracts (5 and 10 mg/kg/day) significantly decreases serum levels of inflammatory cytokines, including IL-2, IL-6, and IL-8; it also significantly raises serum levels of IL-10 and IFN- γ in patients exposed to SM. Furthermore, Z. multiflora increases maximum midexpiratory flow (MMEF) and maximum expiratory flow at 25, 50, and 75% of vital capacity (VC) (MEF25, 50, and 75) of treatment [ 60].
